issue.title: Access scope definition in back-end on CATALOG object
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Since categories were added, the definition of access scope (selection of users or selection of organisms) is no more functionnal. 
See in resource type edition form :
- when select organism access scope : user list is prompted
- when select user acces scope : no choice list visible.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
